DOC.brief_summary: This study design test whether single administration kudzu extract ( 2 mg ) significantly reduce number drink consume single 1 ½ hour drink session give pretreatment 2 ½ hour drink session .
DOC.detailed_description: In laboratory experimental setting , subject treat placebo 2 gram kudzu extract 2.5 hour afternoon drinking session . The investigator hypothesis kudzu pretreatment reduce alcohol consumption free choice , self-administration paradigm .
